checkers

Class CheckersPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • checkers.CheckersPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class CheckersPlayer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Player
    This is the class that houses the game of checkers. This class does NOT communicate with the server. It passes messages between the Board, the GUI. It calls methods from the client class instead. To send a message please pass in a checkersClient object, then create a method within CheckersClient to relay the message to the server for the player
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
